metadata.title: CVE-2022-23134 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: After the initial setup process, some steps of setup.php file are reachable not only by super-administrators, but by unauthenticated users as well. Malicious actor can pass step checks and potentially change the configuration of Zabbix Frontend.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
